page.title: 08Visit- Fothergill & Harvey
page.content: At 9:10am we arrived at Sladen Wood. We were very excited.We were then introduced to three of the firm's managers.First we went to the yarn store where they had{man made yarns} from various European sources.There were fibres such as {glass & Kevlar for ballistics.Then we went into the twisting department.They used high speed beaming machines where the yarn was put on to back beams and then on to weavers'beams. Then at 10:00am we interviewd a worker who had been there a long time.After that we went to Sladen Wood{weaving}shed.The looms were made by RUTI.The noise was so bad we had to wear ear plugs.They were weaving glass and synthetic fibres for making electrical insulation,luggage and bullet proof vests-amongst others. .
